document_data.name: Karl
document_data.nicknames: Dumb Karl{{Cite adventurers league/Bane of the Tradeways|9}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Karl''', commonly known as '''Dumb Karl''', was a [[dwarf]] farmer in the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Bane of the Tradeways|8}}
document_data.Personality: Karl was a homely individual but despite his appearance and nickname he was actually quite bright.
document_data.Activities: Karl was a hill dwarf farmer who produced a lot of the grain delivered to [[Hillsfar]].
document_data.History:
''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], his business declined because the [[Merchants Guild of Hillsfar]] started to boycott non-[[human]] farmers. Worse still, some [[Red Plumes]] decided to make money kidnapping farmers around the city and selling them to [[duergar]] slavers.

In response, Karl joined a bandit group in order to attack a caravan protected by corrupt Red Plumes led by [[Reginald]].{{Cite adventurers league/Bane of the Tradeways|20}}
